pages.text: Support can be found in two places:$(li)$(l:https://discord.com/invite/jXrx4Tu)CM's World discord$(/l)$(li)$(l:https://github.com/ClaudiusMinimus/Create_Conquest_Arcane/issues)Github$(/l)$()$(br2)If you feel a topic needs to be added to this book, please post it on our $(l:https://discord.com/invite/jXrx4Tu)discord$(/l).
